Aujava, High fidelity prototype in java swing

15 Dec 2014 /

For the Audava london based startup, as part of one of the UCL Msc industry projects, inspired by soundcloud, a audio story recording/sharing application.


Tech: Java, Java-Swing, and xml.
1 min reading time

This was a group project in a team of 3, and also included an HCI component of making sketches and mockups and establishing user requirements.

This was the high fidelity java mockup using swing before implementing the app in ruby on rails as part of the UCL Msc CS course requirements.

It used an XML as database to store the application state in between sessions.
